headline: Fluidity: Scripting for Blockchain
description:
Get ready to be bombarded with links :)

I'm a sixteen-year-old from Vermont. Yes, Vermont exists. I got a job programming, but the project died, and I was left looking for a new job which is pretty difficult without a GED or full-time working capability. Someone recommended I check out the Tweag open-source fellowship and come up with an application, so I started writing one. What I came up with was Fluidity, as described in the documents below. I don’t have a huge background in blockchain technology or writing interpreters, so I was hoping anybody sufficiently interested might be able to look over the technology and tell me what I’m overlooking or how foolish the idea is. I promise you it’s at least a little bit interesting.

Application: https://boards.greenhouse.io/tweag/jobs/4638654002#app

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bradly-ovitt-49185a22b/ Overview: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1O8yd5adg0WQAV7osLUQMzMD0uL-DzWMDBRwgzKSDOGU/edit?usp=sharing Qualifications: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zWo8vgl-vF-2Eo_roj5ahYvNtb4dQS0M0S-A4uQMxCE/edit?usp=sharing Annexe: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DMMIpaE1-PNlJpLoeTovJi5O8SqP0PzRfr7YARalAVw/edit?usp=sharing

description_zh-Hans:
准备好被链接轰炸吧:)

我是一个来自佛蒙特州的16岁少年。是的，佛蒙特州存在。我找到了一份编程的工作，但是这个项目夭折了，我只能找一份新的工作，如果没有普通教育证书或全职工作能力，这是很困难的。有人建议我去看看Tweag开源奖学金，并想出一个申请，所以我开始写一个。我想到的是Fluidity，正如下面的文件中所述。我在区块链技术或编写解释器方面没有很大的背景，所以我希望任何有足够兴趣的人能够看一下这项技术，告诉我我忽略了什么，或者这个想法有多愚蠢。我保证它至少有一点点有趣。
